body_html:
@andrewharp Gradle Version 3.3 but Android Plug-In version 2.3.0 (which I assume is what you meant). This is a fresh version of AS on a fresh OS with zero tinkering so not sure why I can't get it to work.

For reference I was just following the tutorial. i.e. Open project, Run (on emulator in this case). I did make one change to force sensor orientation to 90 as it runs at 3 deg on my pixel C but that's it.

I will try again without that change and start from scratch to see if it works again.
